root.name: Mushihime-sama HD
root.description: Mushihime-sama HD is an updated port of Cave's 2004 bullet hell shoot 'em up Mushihime-sama. It is set to be released May 24, 2012 in Japan, and will include updated high resolution sprites as well as new Beginner and Arrange modes. The limited edition release will include a DLC card for downloadingÂ Mushihime-sama Cave Matsuri Ver 1.5, as will the first print run of the standard edition at certain stores.
